Lesson 10: Best Practices for Reproducibility using R

Source: vignettes/lesson_10.Rmd
lesson_10.Rmd

Lesson 10: Best Practices for Reproducibility in R

Lesson 10, we will provide a brief overview of RsNLME workflows that we’ve covered in previous lessons, and demonstrate best practices for organizing your project (e.g., directory structure, scripts, and run output folders) to ensure reproducibility and traceability of your results.


Webinar Overview

In this webinar we will cover:

  • Organizing Runs and Workflow
  • Saving R Scripts and plot/table output to facilitate reporting objectives in Rmarkdown
  • Using version control (GitHub Desktop) to track changes
  • Sharing analysis with others to ensure reproducibility
